front.title: Conformity Statement of Layer-2 aided mobility independent dormant host alerting protocol to RFC 3154

abstract.t: This document states the conformity of Layer-2 aided mobility independent dormant host alerting protocol I-D to RFC 3154 on Requirements and Functional Architecture for an IP Host Alerting Protocol. It is stated to which clauses lahap fully conforms and to which clauses close to full conformance is claimed.
